actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 312 of the Immigration and Nationality Act to permit individuals to be naturalized if they can demonstrate an understanding of a language other than English.

summary.text: Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to permit individuals to be naturalized if they can demonstrate an understanding of any language (presently must demonstrate an understanding of English).

titles.title: A bill to amend section 312 of the Immigration and Nationality Act to permit individuals to be naturalized if they can demonstrate an understanding of a language other than English.
